name: OXY-GONE
description:
Made in 24 Hours for the Dan Pos collaboration video using only the POLYGON - Sci-Fi Worlds Pack. Instructions:

Make your way to the end of the level without your oxygen or health reaching 0. 

Collect oxygen tanks to increase your supply, stay in the glowing bunkers (where your oxygen doesn't deplete) to get away from attacking drones and where you might find some other goodies!

Use the rifle to defend yourself against drones and clear a path for yourself!

Hop in the buggy to drive around the the sand dunes and reach your final destination before your resources run out!

Controls:

Move: W A S D

Jump: Spacebar

Shoot: Left Click

Interact: E

Break (Buggy): Spacebar

Pause: Esc

Use mouse to look around

Known Bugs & Missing Features:
  • When you hop in a buggy, you may be teleported to the other one.
  • There is not muzzle flash or way to know you are firing, except your ammo depleting.
  • At the end when you enter the ship, you may need to step back out to trigger the credits.
  • Frame drops may result in the camera jittering or the controls going janky.
  • Drones can shoot REALLY far, you CANNOT!
